mapper.select:
SELECT `lcap_user_f803ac`.`id` `T1_C1`,`lcap_user_f803ac`.`created_time` `T1_C2`,`lcap_user_f803ac`.`updated_time` `T1_C3`,`lcap_user_f803ac`.`user_id` `T1_C4`,`lcap_user_f803ac`.`user_name` `T1_C5`,`lcap_user_f803ac`.`password` `T1_C6`,`lcap_user_f803ac`.`phone` `T1_C7`,`lcap_user_f803ac`.`email` `T1_C8`,`lcap_user_f803ac`.`display_name` `T1_C9`,`lcap_user_f803ac`.`status` `T1_C10`,`lcap_user_f803ac`.`source` `T1_C11`,`lcap_user_f803ac`.`direct_leader_id` `T1_C12`,`lcap_user_dept_mapping_f803ac`.`id` `T2_C1`,`lcap_user_dept_mapping_f803ac`.`created_time` `T2_C2`,`lcap_user_dept_mapping_f803ac`.`updated_time` `T2_C3`,`lcap_user_dept_mapping_f803ac`.`created_by` `T2_C4`,`lcap_user_dept_mapping_f803ac`.`updated_by` `T2_C5`,`lcap_user_dept_mapping_f803ac`.`user_id` `T2_C6`,`lcap_user_dept_mapping_f803ac`.`dept_id` `T2_C7`,`lcap_user_dept_mapping_f803ac`.`is_dept_leader` `T2_C8` FROM `lcap_user_f803ac` LEFT JOIN `lcap_user_dept_mapping_f803ac` ON `lcap_user_f803ac`.`user_id` = `lcap_user_dept_mapping_f803ac`.`user_id`
`lcap_user_f803ac`.`user_name` LIKE concat('%', concat(#{name}, '%'))
`lcap_user_f803ac`.`id`
ASC
